content.text:
# Draft:Kingdom Voice FM 102.1

Kingdom Voice FM 102.1
Kingdom Voice FM 102.1 MHz is a faith-based radio station located in Kathmandu, Nepal. It is operated by Nobel Engineering Consultancy Pvt. Ltd and is licensed by the Government of Nepal, Ministry of Communication and Information Technology. The FM license registration number is 899/073/074, and the company registration number is 43178/063/064.
The station began broadcasting on 7 January 2023. Kingdom Voice FM is focused on producing and broadcasting Bible-based audio and video programs with the aim of promoting Christian values and discipleship.
Broadcast and Coverage
Kingdom Voice FM operates with a 500-watt transmitter, covering the Kathmandu Valley and its surrounding areas. The station broadcasts for 16 hours daily, from 5:45 AM to 9:00 PM. In addition, it provides 24/7 online streaming through its website [https://www.kingdomfm.com.np www.kingdomfm.com.np].
It is estimated that approximately 1.5 million people tune in to the station daily.
The studio is located in Lalitpur Metropolitan City, Ward No. 14, Thasikhel Chok, Kusunti Height, Lalitpur/Kathmandu.
Mission and Vision
The stated vision of Kingdom Voice FM is: "Making disciples through audio and video programs."
The vision is inspired by the biblical verse: "Go and make disciples of all the nations..."
Strategy and Mission
* Prayer
* Evangelism through media
* Making disciples
* Follow-up
* Training
* Church planting
Media Channels
Kingdom Voice FM is part of a broader media outreach that includes:
* Kingdom Voice FM 102.1 (Radio)
* Upahar Online TV
* Online news portal
* Christian magazine
* Social media platforms
Staffing
As of 2023, the station employs seven full-time staff members.
Contact
* Website: [https://www.kingdomfm.com.np www.kingdomfm.com.np]
* Landline: +977 015919097
* Mobile/WhatsApp: +977 9851102907
* Chairperson: Kumar Singh Bist
